  • Method Details

    • getNumberOfPlayer

      public int getNumberOfPlayer()
      Return the number of players that play a match.
      Returns:
      the number of players, 2, 3 or 4 players.

    • setNumberOfPlayer

      public void setNumberOfPlayer(int numberOfPlayer)
      Set the number of players for a match.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayer - the number of players.

    • isSound

      public boolean isSound()
      Check if sound is on or off.
      Returns:
      true if the sound is on, false otherwise.

    • setSound

      public void setSound(boolean sound)
      Set the sound on or off.
      Parameters:
      sound - the next state of the sound.

    • isFullScreen

      public boolean isFullScreen()
      Check if the game is in full-screen mode.
      Returns:
      true if full-screen, false otherwise.

    • setFullScreen

      public void setFullScreen(boolean fullScreen)
      Set the game to full-screen or to window mode.
      Parameters:
      fullScreen - the next screen mode, true for full-screen, false to window.

    • save

      public void save()
      Save the state of the options to disk.
